title: Busted!: The Young Trib Force Faces Pressure
description: Pursued by authorities from Nicolae High, Vicki and Judd attempt escape. A friend’s betrayal puts Vicki on trial. With Old Testament prophecies coming true before their eyes, the Young Trib Force struggles to spread the truth no matter what the cost.But the noose is tightening. Will the group stick together? Who is the insider at the school helping them?Follow Judd, Vicki, Lionel, and Ryan and the growing Young Trib Force as they continue their perilous journey through the earth’s last days.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins
